productAttributes.productDescription:
Western Digital introduces the WD Elements External hard drive. The Elements disk drive features a practical design for the convenience of portability and handiness. This WD drive is a power-miser and is designed with the same commitment to quality that WD is known for.

Build

 The WD Elements disk drive has a very simple yet likeable design. With a combination of glossy finish on the flank and textured finish on the top of the casing, the WD hard drive features an ergonomic design coupled with undeniable quality. For a desktop hard drive, WD Elements drive is very convenient and easy to manage.

Performance and Requirements

The WD disk drive comes with an enormous data storage capacity up to 2 TB. Equipped with USB 2.0, you get data transfer speeds up to 480 Mbps. Store your complete collection of media files and other important data in the Elements hard drive. The WD drive also comes with Plug n Play simplicity which allows you to simply connect to your computer and start using the drive. There is no need for you to install any driver to run the drive. Compatible and ready to use with Windows Operating Systems, the WD Elements hard drive can easily be reformatted to work with the Mac Operating system as well.

Special Feature

 The WD hard drive runs on an external 100- 240 V AC adapter. The WD Green Power Technology comes as built-in feature in this hard disk. This technology is designed to reduce power consumption by up to 30 %. The power consumption by the internal drive is reduced during idle times and a power-saving feature turns the drive on and off with the computer. On a whole, the WD Elements 2 TB hard disk drive can store and centralise all your information in one unit and free the storage in your computer giving you a better performance.
productAttributes.title: WD Elements 3.5 inch 2 TB External Hard Disk Black

productAttributes.productDescription:

Build

The flank of the Seagate drive has shiny, polished finish and the edges are neatly chiselled giving the disk drive a fashionable look. Seagate hard drive is strongly built and can withstand minor bumps and falls. The Seagate logo etched on the sides of the outer shell looks well-designed. Performance and Requirements

 Seagate FreeAgent hard drive has the capacity to store up to 1 TB of data. You not only get enough space to store all your media collections, you will also have sufficient storage space to hold your entire family's media assets. The Seagate GoFlex hard drive comes with USB 2.0 connectivity which provides data transfer speeds up to 480 Mbps.

Seagate FreeAgent hard drive is compatible with Windows and Mac Operating Systems. With the Included NTFS driver for Mac, you can interchangeably store or access files and folders from Mac and Windows computers without having to reformat. The Seagate FreeAgent hard drive comes with the flexibility of easy upgrade.

The data backup feature offered by Seagate Dashboard ensures automatic and continuous backup of all the data you choose to backup from your computer. In order to protect the data stored in the hard drive from unauthorised access, Seagate also provides file encryption software which ensures the security of all your information.

productAttributes.productDescription:
The WD My Book Essential hard drive is one of the best solutions for your data backup and storage concerns. The WD hard drive gives you super-fast data transfer speeds and large data storage capability. My Book Essential hard disk also comes with a bunch of software which helps in increasing the overall performance.

Build

 Known for its quality and reliability, WD My Book Essential hard drive is designed ergonomically, while at the same time not making any sacrifices in the quality of design. This hard disk nestles neatly along with the rest of your computer peripherals on the desk. The WD hard drive has a polished finish with rounded front edge. The white LED light above the WD logo indicates power and data transfer activities.

 WD hard drive has data storage capacity up to 2 TB. You can store all your digital assets in the drive without having to worry about running out of data storage capacity. With this capacity, you can store more than 3000 albums in MP3 format, or 600 movies, or 40,000 photographs or any combination of such files.

The WD hard disk drive features universal compatibility. It supports USB 3.0 and is USB 2.0 connectivity providing you data transfer speeds up to 5 Gbps. You can now transfer a 2 hour HD movie in about 3 minutes instead of 13 minutes. Backward compatible with USB 2.0, the WD drive gives you the advantage of connecting to various devices which have either one of the two USB connections.

Special features

 The WD My Book Essential hard disk drive comes loaded with safety and security features for the protection of all your data. The SmartWare software gives you the ability to take instant backups of all your important files and folders. The backup feature, once activated, automatically keeps updating the backed-up files and folders on a regular basis without you having to do it repeatedly. The WD SmartWare software comes with a unique visual interface which lets you see the WD drives connected to your computer and provides visual display of your backup as it happens. The SmartWare software allows you retrieve lost files which have a backup.

In order to keep all your files and folders secure the WD drive allows you protect your data with password protection and data encryption feature. You can feel at ease knowing that your data is always protected from unauthorised access.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Transcend Hard Drives are very well known for their design and safety features and the StoreJet 25M2 hard disk is yet another outstanding product in the Transcend family to prove this. The 2.5 inch Transcend StoreJet hard drive comes with unique safety and security features for the protection of all your data that is stored in this drive. Centralise all your information in a single unit with the advantage of easy access and portability.

Build

 One of the features that stands out in the Transcend 25M2 Hard disk drive is the design and build quality. The slim and portable Transcend drive has a protective Silicone outer shell that not only makes the drive look good, but also facilitates a strong. StoreJet hard disk drive is specifically designed for those who are always on the move. The portable Transcend StoreJet hard drive weighs only 206 g and has dimensions of 82.4 x 20.4 x 126.25 mm. This drive can easily fit into your backpack or even a handbag. The StoreJet hard drive has a power button on top with an LED indicator which indicates power and data transfer activities.

Performance and Requirements

 Transcend 25M2 StoreJet hard disk drive comes with up to 500 GB storage capacity. Mobilise your entire media library in this cool, ultra lightweight Transcend disk drive. The huge storage capacity allows you to store up to 25,000 songs, or up to 100 DVD movies, or any combination of both along with plenty of photographs.

Equipped with a USB 2.0 connectivity port, Transcend StoreJet 25M2 hard disk provides transfer speed up to 480 Mbps. The USB connectivity also supplies power to the hard drive directly from your PC or laptop. Compatible with Windows, Mac and Linux Operating Systems, the StoreJet hard disk drive is very flexible and features easy Plug and Play operation for easy accessibility.

Special Features

 The Transcend 25M2 hard drive comes with impressive features to ensure the safety and security of all the data stored in your drive. The Transcend StoreJet drive meets the rigorous US drop test standards. The strong and sturdy disk drive comes with 3-stage shock protection system that combines vibration absorbing silicone outer shell, reinforced hard casing and an internal hard drive suspension damper. Built to withstand incidental knocks, excessive jolts and drops, StoreJet hard drive is sure to keep all your data safe from physical harm.

Transcend Elite backup and security software, which comes pre-loaded with this hard disk drive, ensures the safety all your media assets stored in the drive from getting lost or corrupted. Elite software provides a quick and easy way to backup all the data from your computer or laptop to the Transcend hard disk. Transcend Elite also features One-Touch Auto Backup. One Touch Backup feature enables you to take an instant backup of your computer or laptop with just a click of a button. A powerful 256-bit AES encryption secures all your information from being accessed by unauthorised people.
productAttributes.title: Transcend StoreJet 25M2 2.5 inch 500 GB External Hard Disk Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Transcend StoreJet 25H3P hard disk is a steadfast and powerful solution for the centralisation of your entire digital world. Equipped with SuperSpeed USB 3.0, this Transcend drive gives you advanced data transfer speeds and assures the safety and security of all your data stored in the drive.

Build

 The artistically designed Transcend StoreJet hard drive is guaranteed to steal a few admiring glances wherever you go. The compact design of the drive makes it very handy and easy to carry. Weighing 256 g, with dimensions of 80.8 x 21.7 x 130.8 mm, the StoreJet 25H3P has a silicon outer-shell ensuring it never slips out of your hands.

The Transcend drive has a textured finish at the bottom while the top panel feels soft and secure in your hands. The multifunctional button on the top, lights up with a soft glow by an LED light, giving the hard drive a stylish look. This LED serves as a power and data transfer activity indicator.

 The Transcend hard drive comes with a storage capacity of 1 TB. With this extra-large capacity, you can store up to 200 DVD quality movies or thousands of songs and videos without any difficulty. Connection bandwidth up to 5 Gbps gives you exceptional data transfer speeds for accessing and transferring data to and from the StoreJet hard drive. With 10 times the speed of USB 2.0, you can now transfer an entire DVD movie in less than a minute.

Special Features

 Transcend StoreJet hard drive comes with Transcend Elite backup and security software for the protection of your hard disk from data loss and unauthorised access. Transcend Elite offers quick and easy way of backing up your files and folders. The Elite software also facilitates a powerful 256-bit AES encryption for the security of your data. You can restore the information in your drive at any point of time once you activate the scheduled backup feature.

With the One Touch Backup feature, you can take an instant back up of your drive with just a click of a button. This feature enables you to take a backup of all your data in the Transcend drive on your PC or laptop.

The Transcend StoreJet meets the rigorous US drop test standards. StoreJet 25H3P hard disk is made of durable anti-shock silicone outer shell. This enclosure comes with a reinforced hard casing which evenly distributes the force of impact in case there is an incidental knock or a fall. The advanced internal hard drive suspension system in this drive ensures the safety of the internal disk drive from damage from hard drops, excessive jolts and vibrations. Built for people who are always on the move, the Transcend StoreJet 25H3P hard is an impressive piece of hardware.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Gone are the days when you had to rent VHS tapes and buy audio cassettes for entertainment and music. WD introduces the all new My Book Live Network Drive which comes with remarkable features which will give you the experience of the new world of high definition entertainment.

Build

 The WD Home Network Drive is built for performance and flexibility. My Book Network Drive has a matte finish and is curved in the front which gives it a book-like shape. The WD logo is crafted neatly on the face of the drive, over which a small LED light indicates power and data transfer activities. For a storage device with up to 2 TB of data capacity, this Home Network drive is very convenient and nimble.

Performance

 The WD My Book Live Home Network Drive comes with a built-in 800 MHz processor for maximum performance to power all the applications, from streaming to remote access. Compatible with Windows and Mac Operating Systems, this WD Network Drive lets you create your own personal cloud storage. You can access all your files, whether at home or away, with your Mac, PC, smart phone or iPad. The advantage of having a personal cloud is that you have complete control over all the data stored in the WD Home Network Drive. Unlike with public clouds, personal cloud lets you store all your files in one safe place like on your home network. You do not have to pay any monthly fees and there is no mysterious location involved in storing your memory. Your whole collection of information stays at your home, under your complete control.

The Home Network Drive comes with WD 2go web access feature which lets you access the contents of your WD drive from anywhere in the world, provided you have an internet connection. Once you install the WD 2go software on your smart phone or tablet, it is like having up to 2 TB of extra storage space in your mobile device. The WD 2go application supports most of the popular document types like Microsoft Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Apple Keynote and much more. This feature also allows you to sync the WD drive to your mobile devices. WD 2go runs on Apple iOS as well as Android OS for mobile devices.

This Network Drive comes with WD Photos application. You can take pictures on your mobile phone and easily upload them on the personal cloud storage. Also get access to all the photos stored on your cloud with a smartphone or tablet. Upload pictures and videos from your mobile device directly to the WD Network Drive and watch them on your entertainment centre once you get back home. The WD Live Home Network Drive also provides the feasibility of uploading media on social networking sites like Facebook, Twitter and Flickr.

The WD Live Home Network Drive streams music, movies and photos to any device in your home that is DLNA-certified like HD TVs, mobile devices, Blu-ray disc player tablets, gaming consoles like PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360 and UPnP-certified devices. With the huge storage capacity up to 2 TB, you centralise your entire family?s files and folders in the WD Live Home Media Network Drive. With the feasibility to work with wireless routers, you get wireless access to all the data stored in this drive. This WD drive includes iTunes server support, enabling you to stream all your media to any Mac or PC with iTunes.

Connectivity and Protection

 Equipped with one of the most advanced Ethernet chip technology, WD drive delivers data with transfer speeds much higher than the traditional USB 2.0 connection. With so much of data stored in one place, precautions and safety measures have to be made in order to safeguard all the information stored in the drive. WD My Book Live Home Network drive comes pre-loaded with the WD SmartWare software which backs up your data automatically once it is configured.

The SmartWare software can be easily installed and is fully automatic. This software features a unique visual interface which lets you see all the WD drives connected to your computer. It also displays the backup of all the files and folder you select to be backed up. Once the information you want backed up is selected, the SmartWare software shows you the total amount of data that has been selected category-wise. Once you hit the ?Start Backup? button, after the first backup, your files will be backed up automatically every time you change or add a file. Mac users can utilise all the function of Apple Time Machine backup software to protect their data.

The WD SmartWare software also facilitates easy recovery of lost files and folders. All you do is use the search function and find the lost file in a matter of minutes. SmartWare also ensures drive security.
productAttributes.title: WD My Book Live Home 2 TB Network Hard Disk Black

productAttributes.productDescription:

 The WD My Book Home Network drive sports a sleek look with simple design features. The matte finish and the curved front panel with the WD logo in white at the bottom look very neat.  The 1 TB WD Home Network hard drive is laden with exceptional utilities which enhance the whole multimedia environment in your house and take it to the next level. With the huge storage space, you get to store millions of movies, music and videos. One of the best features of multimedia drives is that you no more have to go through the hassle of loading video cassettes, CDs or DVDs in the player. Centralising all your families important files in one place makes for easy accessibility, safety and security. The WD drive comes with Ethernet connectivity which allows you to connect to a WiFi adapter and providing you wireless access to the drive. With read speeds up to 100 Mbps, you get 4 times the read speeds of most consumer network drives in the market today. The Home Network Drive supports Windows and Mac Operating Systems.

Features

 The WD hard drive comes equipped with the WD SmartWare software which facilitates the backup of all your home computers in a single, reliable place. Every time you save a new file or folder, it instantly gets backed up. The WD Photos is a photo viewer application aids in storing photographs thereby saving space on your iPhone or any other smart phone. WD Photos allows you to access the photographs in the drive through your phone.

The WD provides remote access technology which facilitates remote access of the WD Home Network hard drive over the internet. WD Home Network drive streams movies, music and videos to any DLNA-certified multimedia device such as a WD TV Live HD Media Player, Blu-ray Disc player, Xbox 360 or Playstation 3. This WD hard drive utilizes the Apple Time Machine backup software to protect your data.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Your best friend in the digital age; the Samsung M3 Portable Hard Drive is luxury added to your life at every moment giving you the ultimate storage solution.

Handy portable storage

Compact and sleek, this portable hard disk from Samsung is developed to give you a complete and satisfying solution to all your data storage concerns. With 1 TB of generous storage packed into a small pocket-fitting device, you can take all your videos, photos and data with you wherever you go.

Durable design

Built in an excellent sturdy design with a strong outer, the drive can withstand a relatively large amount of impact when dropped. Designed to last longer keeping your data protected, the Samsung M3 drive is a device you can rely upon when it comes to data storage.

Integrated with SafetyKey protection

To deliver a higher level of security for all your data Samsung integrates the SafetyKey technology that keeps your data extra safe during automatic backups. This feature sets a password on the backups with data compression.


USB 3.0 connectivity

Experience ultra-fast speeds of data transfer while you transfer hug chunky folders and files containing large videos and photos with the latest USB 3.0 interface. The USB 3.0 delivers speeds that are around three times the speed of the USB 2.0. This drive also supports the USB 2.0 incase your system supports only USB 2.0.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Computers are increasingly being shipped with more and more space available on the hard disk. This is definitely a positive trend, though many still find that space continues to be a premium. The best possible solution is to get an external hard disk like the 1 TB, My Passport Ultra external hard drive by WD. The hard drive comes with a USB port that is compatible with both, the 2.0 and the 3.0 formats. Connecting it to a USB 3.0 port will allow you to transfer data to and from your computer at blazingly fast speeds.

The Hard Drive is perfect for people who wish to store large quantities of files like movies, music, important documents and sensitive data in a safe and secure manner. With the WD Security features, you can password protect and encrypt your drive to keep prying eyes away from your files. The WD SmartWare Pro is an automatic backup feature that syncs your data and backs it up in the background, thereby keeping your data safe from corruption while using minimal PC resources. The drive backs up data to the cloud so that you always have an online copy of the files you choose to backup.

The WD External Hard Drive is USB powered, which means there is no need for extra wires or to keep an extra USB port reserved to simply provide power to the unit. The hard drive is enclosed within a durable shell that provides it resistance to shock, outside elements and also gives it long-term reliability. You can thus rest assured that your data will not get corrupted just because your drive was knocked about a little by accident.
productAttributes.title: WD My Passport Ultra 2.5 inch 1 TB External Hard Drive Black

productAttributes.productDescription: ReadyNAS: Storage Made Easy Photographs, video clips, songs, web sites, text messages, the types of data that enrich our lives can seem endless. With ReadyNAS you finally have an easy way to centralize, access and share your digital world. Way more than just simple storage for all your stuff, every ReadyNAS features, unprecedented protection of your files, the ability to manage stored data from any webenabled device and a library of add-ons that allow you to do more with your storage than you ever thought possible Every networked attached storage NAS device from NETGEAR runs on the revolutionary ReadyNAS operating system. Designed with ease-of-use in mind, new devices are discovered automatically through the cloud and feature a sleek, modern interface. Also, stored data is protected not only with automatic RAID configuration, but this ReadyNAS is the first to offer home users the continuous data protection of unlimited snapshots along with real-time anti-virus and native encryption. In addition to the confidence of knowing data is secure from virtually any threat, ReadyNAS features remote access innovations, seamless cloud-based file synchronization ReadyDROP and the ability to backup data from your Mac anywhere in the world when using Apple Time Machine. These days, your data is your world. With ReadyNAS, protecting and accessing that world has never been easier. ReadyNAS ? Storage Made EASY. ReadyNAS 104 CPU Marvell Armada 370 1.2GHz, Memory 512MB. productAttributes.productDescription: Lenovo Iomega ix4-300d, Network storage 4-bay. Compact storage, Advanced data protection, Cloud convenience. Desktop network storage designed for small offices, workgroups or advanced home networks. Powered by enterprise-class lenovoemc storage technology, the lenovo iomega ix4-300d, network storage 4-bay, is a high-capacity storage solution with advanced data protection that stores, shares and protects all of your important fi les, locally and remotely with cloud convenience. Perfect for small offi ces, workgroups or advanced home networks, the lenovo iomega ix4 provides easy fi le sharing, snapshots, user quotas, iscsi block access, multiple raid confi gurations for optimized data protection and powerful backup features for home or offi ce. The lenovo iomega ix4 comes fully populated with up to 12tb of storage capacity and includes built-in video surveillance solutions and cloud sharing options.Embedded cloud technologyLenovoemc offers a fast and effi cient ?on-ramp? to the cloud along with fl exible options for safeguarding business-critical data. With lenovoemc, you have unprecedented choices, including personal, private, public and hybrid clouds, to meet your business, budget and data protection needs. Regardless of approach, lenovoemc ensures that fi les and folders can be easily backed up directly from any lenovoemc device to the cloud?it?s really that simple and seamless to ensure vital business data is safe and sound.Video surveillance storageWith lenovoemc, it?s easy to view, archive, protect and share physical security video and audio fi les from anywhere with built-in video surveillance solutions. The lenovo iomega ix4-300d comes equipped with mindtree securemind surveillance manager to deliver a stand-alone vms that easily sets up recordings and confi gurations directly and offers live monitoring, video recording, and easy, fast video playback from multiple ip cameras.Business usersBusiness users will appreciate the advanced data protection features such as device-to-device data replication, user replaceable hard drives, support for uninterruptible power supplies ups and certifi cation for most virtualization environments. The easy-to-use interface, active directory support, user quotas, and remote access features provide no-hassle management.Home usersHome users will benefi t from the advanced media sharing features such as the dlna compatible, upnp av media server, torrent download support, bluetooth upload, automated social media picture or video sharing to facebook, flickr and youtube, and digital photography tools like picture transfer protocol. Network storage highlights Powered by enterprise-class lenovo emc lifeline soft wareIomega link provides a remote handheld mobile connection to your dataSupports pc, mac & linux clients and is vmware certifiedAnywhere in the world access with embedded cloud storage technology solutionsBuilt-in mindtree video surveillance vms solution, with one free camera licenseDlna compatible media serverAvailable in up to 12tb capacity Key differentiators Enhanced operating system - powerful lenovo emc lifeline software allows users to store and manage all of their valuable data on one centralized, secure, affordable storage appliance. System status dashboard - the lenovoemc lifeline system status dashboard provides a one-stop-shop for space usage, device information, control, and status. If one of these components has encountered an error, you are linked to the page that requires your attention. Raid support - raid 0, 1, 5 and 10. With automatic raid rebuild. Jbod mode also available. Dual gigabit ethernet connectivity - dual gigabit ethernet connectivity with jumbo frame support and high performance embedded architecture. Iscsi target - provides block-level access for the most effi cient storage utilization, especially for backup, database and email application performance. It can be used in parallel with fi le-level storage access via cifs/nfs. Snapshots - allows backup of a source volume at a certain point in time and restore to the source volume, reverting to its state at the time. Ssd caching cache pools - pool of solid-state drives designed to increase read and write speeds. Active directory high availability - ads failover and load balancing clustering. Deduplicating backup with emc avamar - equipped with integrated data deduplication technology, avamar facilitates fast, daily full backups signifi cantly reducing backup windows. Sharing - access fi les from any networked windows pc, linux or mac for easy fi le sharing and data backup. Simplifi ed backup - pc backup with acronis and time machine compatibility for os x. Lenovoemc link - lenovoemc link gives you a direct link to your lenovo iomega device via your iphone, ipod touch, ipad, or android mobile device. Remote access - you can safely connect to your valuable fi les from anywhere in the world, through an internet connection. Power savings - idle drive spin-down reduces power consumption; a variable-speed fan ensures that only the right amount of power is used to cool your device. Power handling improvements - scheduled power off/wake on lan supports the ability for a device to ?go to sleep? and shut itself down or ?wake on? when there is little to no traffic or activity to reduce power consumption. Network file protocols supported - cifs/smb/rally microsoft, nfs linux/unix, afp/bonjour apple, ftp, sftp tftp, http, https, webdav, windows dfs, snmp. Virtual environment support - vmware, citrix xenserver and windows compatible for nfs & iscsi. Device-to-device data replication - replicate your data from device to device, to an external usb drive, or to another network target. Backup-to-disk b2d target - with hcl listing, lenovo iomega network storage products are identifi ed as compatible disk targets for symantec backup exec software. Video surveillance - use as a surveillance storage target and simply store surveillance video on up to 12tb of capacity and utilize remote management; or get an all encompassing solution that blends smart storage, leading vms software and ip cameras with the integrated video management system ivms, connecting up to 8 cameras per device with mindtree securemind surveillance manager; utilize cloud technology for a low-cost solution with the hosted video surveillance solution hvss. Personal cloud technology - the ultimate data protection and remote access solution for smbs, this web-based solution protects valuable business information and is completely self-owned, so there are no usage or subscription charges. Cloud backup options - back up selected fi les directly from your lenovo iomega network storage device to the mozyconnect, atmos or amazon s3 storage cloudsFor off-site safekeeping of important data. Additional charges apply. Mac os x lion and time machine support - supports mac mountain lion os x 10.8 and time machine, allowing the lenovoemc network storage device to serve as a time machine target for your apple computers. User quotas - manage capacity by setting a maximum for shared storage. Ups support - enables unattended system shutdown via the usb port without data loss in the case of power failure. Upnp and dlna compatible - lenovo iomega ix4 series will work seamlessly with digital products you may own or buy from different manufacturers allowing you to save, store and stream all kinds of multimedia files. Expandability - add storage capacity by connecting external usb hard disk drives; read and write on fat32, ntfs, hfs+, or ext2/ext3 formatted hard disks. Key features Lenovoemc lifelineDual gbe connectivityRaid 5, 10 and jbodAutomatic raid rebuild and easy swap1 usb 3.0 port and 2 usb 2.0 portsDevice-to-device data replicationVmware, xenserver, windows compatibleSolid state drive compatibility

productAttributes.productDescription:
The IOmega ScreenPlay DX HD Media Player is packed with state-of-the-art entertainment features. Stay connected to the web with the built in web browser which has direct access to popular site. Enjoy numerous HD movies with vivid clarity on this IOmega Media Player.

Build

 The IOmega Media Player has a simple and elegant design. With a smooth glossy finish on its flanks, the top and bottom casing have a matte finish. With dimensions of 203 x 156.71 x 46.99 mm and weighing 1.19 kg, the IOmega HD Media Player is quite portable and can easily be accommodated in your TV stand or even be carried in a laptop bag.

This impressive IOmega Media Player allows you to stream videos directly through this media player from anywhere in your house.

Performance and Multimedia

 Experience the superior picture and sound quality with the 1080p HD quality and Dolby Digital audio formats. With the IOmega Media Player, you can centralise all your digital entertainment content and enjoy it directly on your large screen HDTV. With the 2 TB storage capacity you will be able to store around 500,000 songs, 800,000 photos and 770 hrs of video. There is enough memory to manage, store and share all your music, movies and other data.

With connectivity features like HDMI, you get to enjoy watching HD movies and videos. The DLNA Certified IOmega Media Player allows you to stream movies and music from the internet directly to your big screen TV via WiFi. The IOmega Media Player also facilitates TV show episodes from various web sites on the internet. This player comes with composite video, component video, coaxial optical S-PDIF and USB ports. The availability of these ports relieves you from the trouble of having to copy the music or data to the player and facilitates direct play from the external devices like pen drives or camcorders.

The IOmega Media Player is compatible with Microsoft Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 and Mac OS X 10.5 - 10.6. The IOmega ScreenPlay DX HD Media Player supports multiple video and audio formats like DivX Plus HD MKV, Xvid, MP3, WAV, M4A and DTS. In addition to this, IOmega Media Player also supports JPEG, BMP, GIF, PNG and TIFF picture formats.

Features

 The IOmega Media player lets you share with your friends on the networking sites like Facebook, Twitter, Flickr and a lot others. This IOmega also offers direct access to media sites on the internet such as Netflix, Pandora and more.

With its multi-sharing facility, all the devices in your house can use the IOmega Media Player to store and access data. This player can also synchronise with your iPod Touch, iPhone and digital photo-frames. The ergonomic remote control that comes with this player makes your life easier with its simple and easily understandable user interface. This remote features full QWERTY-format. You can control all the features of the player with the remote. The security features like WEP 64 bit and 128 bit, WPA TKIP, WPA2 and AES keep your entire content safe and secure.
productAttributes.title: IOmega ScreenPlay DX HD 3.5 inch 2 TB Media Player Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
IOmega brings you the new world of digital entertainment with the IOmega ScreenPlay DX HD Media Player. You will get to experience videos, movies, photos and music in brilliant high definition on you TV screen or home theatre system with this IOmega DX HD Media Player. IOmega Media Player is one-of-kind entertainment device that is sure to impress you and your family with the host of features designed to make your life more colourful.

Build

 The sleek IOmega hard drive features a lustrous flank and the top has a textured finish. The simple and portable design of the ScreenPlay HD drive makes it easy for you to place it anywhere in your house. Weighing 1190 g, the IOmega HD Media Player has dimensions of 203.2 x 156.7 x 47 mm. The ScreenPlay HD Media Player can easily be accommodated in your laptop bag or a small back-pack.

Performance and Multimedia

 IOmega HD Player gives you crystal clear picture quality with 1080p HD video playback. DLNA certified, this IOmega player lets you stream videos and music anywhere in your house to various devices like a smart phones, laptops, computers and other such devices. IOmega supports Dolby Digital audio format and DTS for a life-like and superior audio experience. This IOmega drive supports all the popular media formats like MPEG4, DivX, H.264, MP3, WMA, and JPEG enabling you to enjoy all the photos, videos and music in your media collection.

The huge data storage capacity of 1 TB provides you with more than enough space to centralise all your media assets in a single unit. You can store up to 250,000 songs, or up to 385 hours of music, or thousands of photographs, or a combination of any such files easily without any hassle. This Media Palyer comes fitted out with a hoard of connectivity features like HDMI, Ethernet, Composite Video, Component Audio, Coaxial Optical S-PDIF, USB 2.0. You can enjoy high definition movies and videos with HDMI compatible devices. This IOmega ScreenPlay DX HD Player supports Windows and Mac Operating Systems. The IOmega media player adds wireless functionality for ease of access through other devices connected to a home network. You can also connect USB pen drives to the IOmega Player and directly play the media files from the drive.

Features

 With built-in web browsers, IOmega HD player lets you share photos and other media on networking sites like Facebook, Twitter and Flickr. The ScreenPlay HD also offers a direct access to media sites on the internet such as NetFlix and Pandora, where you can watch unlimited movies and videos online. The ScreenPlay DX HD Player can synchronise with your iPhone, iPod Touch and digital frames. One of the coolest features about the IOmega drive is the cool remote control which comes in full QWERTY-format. The ergonomic remote control provides a simple and easy user interface. In order to keep all your media files and folder safe and secure, the ScreenPlay media player comes with security features like WEP 64 bit and 128 bit, WPA TKIP, WPA2 and AES data encryption.
productAttributes.title: IOmega ScreenPlay DX HD 3.5 inch 1 TB Media Player Black

productAttributes.productDescription: Centralize your storage and backups with a complete network storage solution and private cloud for small businesses.The Seagate Business Storage 4-bay NAS is a complete network storage solution designed to keep businesses with up to 50 employees productive by creating a secure private cloud. With the included backup software for Windows, Time Machine compatibility and RAID protection, it?s simple to keep your critical business files protected. The Business Storage 4-bay NAS creates a shared space for your colleagues and clients to collaborate by storing files centrally. With the Global Access service, you can stay connected to your business from anywhere in the world with free apps for iPhone, iPad and Android devices. The Business Storage 4-bay NAS features a Web interface where clients and coworkers can securely download and upload large files. Unlike typical cloud storage services, you retain complete ownership and control of your data. Plus, it is so easy to set up and use that there?s no need to hire an IT professional. The Business Storage 4-bay NAS comes with everything your business needs to ensure complete protection for all the files stored on PC and Mac? computers in your business. The included BlackArmor? backup software for Windows? PCs will take the hassle out of backing up multiple computers by automating the process. The software helps you protect data by backing up not only the files you store, but also the programs, settings, email and even the operating system on your local PCs. With this level of protection, you can restore the entire hard drive on a PC that has suffered a hardware failure. By supporting Time Machine? software, the Business Storage 4-bay NAS offers the same level of data protection for all the Mac computers in your business.
productAttributes.title: Seagate Rack Mount Biz NAS 16 TB Wired external_hard_drive Black

productAttributes.productDescription: Seagate Backup Plus Slim, easy automatic backup for your digital life on your computer, mobile devices and the cloud.The Seagate Backup Plus Slim portable drive simplifies backup for consumers who want to help protect their entire digital life locally, in the cloud, from mobile devices or from social networks. The slim, metal design allows you to slide the drive into your pocket, purse or backpack and carry it with you. Via the Seagate Dashboard, use the Protect function to set up a one-click plan or schedule your automatic local backup. Keep multiple copies of your files in case disaster strikes. Install the free Seagate Mobile Backup app on an iOS or Android mobile device to back up all of the pictures and videos from the device to the drive or the cloud. Back up mobile devices via a WiFi connection while at home, or use services like Dropbox or Google Drive while on-the-go, away from home.With the Save feature, user-generated content can be backed up from your favorite social networks. Capture a memory, post it on a social networking site, and let the Seagate Dashboard automatically back up any content posted, even photos that you are tagged in.The Share feature allows multiple files to be uploaded to social networks at once from your computer. Simply select files to upload, choose where to post them and even add comments. Managing your social profile has never been easier.Install the pre-loaded NTFS driver for Mac, and use the drive interchangeably between Windows and Mac? computers without reformatting the drive.

productAttributes.productDescription: A complete network storage solution and private cloud for power users and businesses with up to 25 employees Seagate? NAS 2-bay is a full-featured network storage solution offering the easiest setup and the industry?s most intuitive interface. The NAS 2-bay features hardware, software and Seagate drives designed to work together seamlessly, which reduces your setup time to just a few minutes and delivers reliable performance for years to come. In addition, Seagate runs hours of extensive tests on every NAS 2-bay before it leaves our manufacturing facility, to further ensure the system is running at its best. The NAS 2-bay runs Seagate NAS OS 4 software, completely designed from the ground up to deliver ease of use, performance, reliability and a flexible platform for running add-on apps, enabling you to do more with your NAS. With the App Manager in NAS OS 4, you can choose to install apps that enhance the functionality of the NAS, such as our surveillance app that turns the NAS into a recording solution for IP cameras or our anti-virus app that can scan files and identify potential threats before it?s too late. Drives are the core of any high-capacity storage solution and Seagate delivers a specialized drive specifically for NAS systems. Seagate NAS HDD drives, included with the NAS 2-bay, are engineered to run 24?7 to deliver the performance needed by various business applications, yet run cooler than other drives on the market. Furthermore, NAS HDD drives are rated for higher reliability than a standard desktop drive, offering more protection for your business?s critical files. The storage volume on the NAS 2-bay is preconfigured, which can save you hours of setup time compared to traditional RAID configurations. If you choose to purchase our diskless model or want to change the default configuration, we offer SimplyRAID? technology to speed up and simplify that process too. SimplyRAID technology, built into the NAS OS software, will help you choose the RAID configuration that is best for your business by balancing performance, capacity and redundancy. Another benefit from our SimplyRAID technology is the ability to begin storing files and using the NAS instantly after choosing your preferred configuration. No more waiting hours or days for the RAID volume to build!

productAttributes.productDescription: Centralize your storage and backups with a complete network storage solution and private cloud for small businesses.The Seagate Business Storage 4-bay NAS is a complete network storage solution designed to keep businesses with up to 50 employees productive by creating a secure private cloud. With the included backup software for Windows, Time Machine compatibility and RAID protection, it?s simple to keep your critical business files protected. The Business Storage 4-bay NAS creates a shared space for your colleagues and clients to collaborate by storing files centrally. With the Global Access service, you can stay connected to your business from anywhere in the world with free apps for iPhone, iPad and Android devices. The Business Storage 4-bay NAS features a Web interface where clients and coworkers can securely download and upload large files. Unlike typical cloud storage services, you retain complete ownership and control of your data. Plus, it is so easy to set up and use that there?s no need to hire an IT professional. The Business Storage 4-bay NAS comes with everything your business needs to ensure complete protection for all the files stored on PC and Mac? computers in your business. The included BlackArmor? backup software for Windows? PCs will take the hassle out of backing up multiple computers by automating the process. The software helps you protect data by backing up not only the files you store, but also the programs, settings, email and even the operating system on your local PCs. With this level of protection, you can restore the entire hard drive on a PC that has suffered a hardware failure. By supporting Time Machine? software, the Business Storage 4-bay NAS offers the same level of data protection for all the Mac computers in your business.

productAttributes.productDescription: 1TB Sony HD-E1 Portable External Hard Drive USB 3.0 & 2.0 1 TB The 1TB External Hard Drive is preloaded with softwares that enhance faster transfer speeds, provide greater data security and automatic backup for all your important files. Back up, store and transport your important files, digital images, MP3s and videos with the Sony HDE1/BC2 external hard disk drive. In addition to 1TB of storage capacity, this drive comes equipped with preloaded software that delivers up to 3x faster data transfer, password protection and easy data backup?all wrapped up in a sophisticated, contemporary design. We?ve seen a few USB 3.0 gadgets, but the 1TB Sony HD-E1 is the first truly pocket-sized USB 3.0 external hard drive we?ve tested. Perfect for laptop users, it will suit those buying a new Ultrabook or who already own a recent USB 3.0-enabled model. In design, it?s compact and covered in brushed aluminium, only a little larger than the average smartphone and a similar shape. Ours was black, but there?s a selection of colours available. Apart from the USB 3.0 connector, the only feature is a blue light to indicate drive activity. The 56cm cable is used to both power the drive and for data transfer. We?d like a little more information ? such as an indicator of available space ? but it?s attractive and very portable. We tested the drive with HD Tach, as well as by performing standard data transfers, with a current model USB 3.0-enabled laptop. With HD Tach, the drive recorded random access times of around 16.8ms, which is mid-range speed overall, but fast for a 2.5-inch drive. The average read speed was 86MBytes/sec, with maximum burst speed while reading from the drive of 238MByte/sec, both of which rate well for this size drive but don?t match 3.5-inch external drive speeds. When transferring movie files, we achieved read speeds over 100MByte/sec. Even for 3000 small files totalling 100MB, which is a challenging task for any drive, we managed a decent 20MByte/sec read speed. Write speed was slower, averaging 5MByte/sec for small files and 16MByte/sec for large media files, but these are mostly acceptable. In terms of overall performance this is a great little pocket drive, and its slimline design is appealing. It comes with backup software, and encryption, and it?ll make a great accessory for a new laptop.
productAttributes.title: Sony External Hard Drive E1/BC2 - Pouch 1 TB Wired external_hard_drive Silver

productAttributes.productDescription: Centralize your storage and backups with a complete network storage solution and private cloud for small businesses. The Seagate? Business Storage 1-bay NAS is a complete network storage solution designed to keep businesses with up to 10 employees productive by creating a secure private cloud. With the included backup software for Windows?, Time Machine? compatibility and hardware encryption technology, it?s simple to keep your critical business files protected. The Business Storage 1-bay NAS creates a shared space for your colleagues and clients to collaborate by storing files centrally. With the Global Access? service, you can stay connected to your business from anywhere in the world with free apps for iPhone?, iPad? and Android? devices. The Business Storage 1-bay NAS features a Web interface where clients and coworkers can securely download and upload large files. Unlike typical cloud storage services, you retain complete ownership and control of your data. Plus, it is so easy to set up and use that there?s no need to hire an IT professional. The Business Storage 1-bay NAS comes with everything your business needs to ensure complete protection for all the files stored on PC and Mac? computers in your business. The included BlackArmor? backup software for Windows? PCs will take the hassle out of backing up multiple computers by automating the process. The software helps you protect data by backing up not only the files you store, but also the programs, settings, email and even the operating system on your local PCs. With this level of protection, you can restore the entire hard drive on a PC that has suffered a hardware failure. By supporting Time Machine? software, the Business Storage 1-bay NAS offers the same level of data protection for all the Mac computers in your business.
productAttributes.title: Seagate Business Storage NAS HDD 3 TB Wired external_hard_drive Black

productAttributes.productDescription: Seagate Backup Plus, easy backup for your digital life on your computer, mobile devices and the cloud The Seagate? Backup Plus desktop drive simplifies backup for consumers who want to help protect their entire digital life locally, in the cloud, from mobile devices or from social networks. Via the Seagate Dashboard, use the Protect function to set up a one-click plan or schedule your automatic local backup. Keep multiple copies of your files in case disaster strikes. Install the free Seagate Mobile Backup app on an iOS or Android mobile device to back up all of the pictures and videos from the device to the drive or the cloud. Back up mobile devices via a WiFi connection while at home, or use services like Dropbox or Google Drive while on-the-go, away from home. With the Save feature, user-generated content can be backed up from your favorite social network sites. Capture a memory, post it on a social networking site and let the Seagate Dashboard automatically back up any content posted, even photos that you are tagged in. The Share feature allows multiple files to be uploaded to social networks at once from your computer. Simply select files to upload, choose where to post them and even add comments. Managing your social profile has never been easier. Install the pre-loaded NTFS driver for Mac, and use the drive interchangeably between Windows and Mac? computers without reformatting the drive
